Uses of Class
jsx.event.Handle

Packages that use Handle
jsx.event Deals with browser-level events eliminating dependencies. 
jsx.ui Contains general classes for representing user interfaces. 
jsx.ui.css Contains classes manipulating user interfaces through CSS. 
 

Uses of Handle in jsx.event
 

Methods in jsx.event with parameters of type Handle

          Attaches a handle if it exists.
static void Handle.detach(Handle h)
          Detaches a handle if it exists.
